body:
Thanks @rmlarsen. I added zero dimensions and single classes for benchmark. No significant performance changes so far:

Before:
```
Benchmark: zero_dimension_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000133 s 	 Throughput: 96.2 GB/s

Benchmark: single_class_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000131 s 	 Throughput: 97.6 GB/s

```

After:
```
Benchmark: zero_dimension_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000135 s 	 Throughput: 94.7 GB/s

Benchmark: single_class_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000133 s 	 Throughput: 96.4 GB/s
```
body_html:

After:

body_text:
Thanks @rmlarsen. I added zero dimensions and single classes for benchmark. No significant performance changes so far:
Before:
Benchmark: zero_dimension_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000133 s 	 Throughput: 96.2 GB/s

Benchmark: single_class_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000131 s 	 Throughput: 97.6 GB/s


After:
Benchmark: zero_dimension_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000135 s 	 Throughput: 94.7 GB/s

Benchmark: single_class_m_128_n_100000_k_100000_use_gpu_False 	 wall_time: 0.000133 s 	 Throughput: 96.4 GB/s
